summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Delridge Way (Westerly Side), from West Roxbury Street to West Trenton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13368 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
